Title: Provides remedies for tenants of illegal dwelling units who were forced to vacate due to an emergency vacate order or eviction
Summary: Requires a rebate of all rent paid to a landlord to be paid back to a tenant who was forced to vacate an illegal dwelling unit pursuant to an emergency vacate order or eviction.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to providing remedies for tenants of illegal dwelling units who were forced to vacate due to an emergency vacate order or eviction
